title: BRIEF-Metro Pacific Investments Says Unit Buys CIIF Infrastructure & CAIF III Infrastructure
text:
BRIEF-Metro Pacific Investments Says Unit Buys CIIF Infrastructure & CAIF III Infrastructure

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 24, 2019 07:50)

BRIEF-Metro Pacific Investments Says Unit Buys CIIF Infrastructure & CAIF III Infrastructure Sept 24 (Reuters) - Metro Pacific Investments Corp :

* METRO PACIFIC INVESTMENTS - UNIT ACQUIRED 100% EQUITY

INTEREST

IN EACH OF CIIF INFRASTRUCTURE HOLDINGS AND CAIF III

INFRASTRUCTURE HOLDINGS

* METRO PACIFIC INVESTMENTS - UNIT THUS INDIRECTLY ACQUIRED

AGGREGATE ADDITIONAL 24.98% INTEREST IN PT MARGAUTAMA NUSANTARA

VIA CIIF TRANSACTIONS



Source text https://reut.rs/2mEH5jf

Further company coverage: MPI.PS





BRIEF-Metro Pacific Investments Says Unit Buys CIIF Infrastructure & CAIF III Infrastructure
